about_me.des: I am a young data scientist with a background in general mathematics, and experience in data mining, machine learning, and scientific languages.

projects.CD4: Image denoising using Gaussian mixture models and classification algorithms (K-means, Expectation-Maximization). #Python #R #Matlab
projects.d3js: Development of a conversational chatbot based on the BERT architecture | #Python #html #css #javascript #d3js
projects.Oil: Simulation of a Matérn process to understand how grouped data manifest and how different parameters influence their spatial distribution. | #R #Python
projects.geoloc: Implementation of an analysis and prediction algorithm | #Matlab #R #Python
projects.velov: Determining the evolution of bike-sharing in Lyon, descriptive analysis, statistics, and learning on this data. #kafka #spark

career.Eligo_des: Implementation of algorithms for predicting soil mechanical parameters.
career.master2_des: I followed the Data Science track shared between the computer science and mathematics departments at the University of Lyon 1.
career.master2_job: Master Data Science | Claude Bernard University Lyon 1 (UCBL) - Ecole Centrale - Liris | Lyon
career.master2_course1: Statistical Models and Regression, Probabilistic Graphical Models, Complex Graph Theory and Combinatorics, Data Visualization, Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine Learning
career.internship: Laboratory of Computer Science in Images and Information Systems (LIRIS) - Internship
career.internship_des: Development of a chatbot using the BERT architecture
career.internship_course1: Data collection, Data cleaning, Machine learning, Deep learning, Preprocessing, Nifi, HDFS, Spark
career.master1_des: In June 2019, I completed my first year of master's in Applied Mathematics and Statistics
career.master1_job: Master in Statistics, Computer Science and Digital Techniques | UCBL | Lyon
career.master1_course1: Numerical Analysis, Probability, Parametric Statistics, Time Series, Dynamical Systems, Stochastic Processes
career.bachelor_des: I completed my Bachelor's degree in General Mathematics, which provided me with a very solid foundation
career.bachelor_job: Bachelor's in General Mathematics and Applications | University of Avignon | Avignon
